title: Project Checklist
description: A 10-point checklist for enterprise projects, stories that begin from scratch, to ensure that they are new, relevant, and impactful, and include a problem that needs correction, a solution, and a way to quantify the issue, with the potential for change or reform, and including on-the-record victims and unique sources of new information, and that can be described in six words or less, and that the author believes is important.
